title: ClassPlus | Data Engineer | Noida
content:
Education: CS from Tier 3 
Years of Experience:1 YOE 
Prior Experience: ASE in Data at Fintech Company. 
Location: Remote Job
Date of the Offer: Aug 24
Company: ClassPlus/TestBook
Title: Data Engineer+Backend Developer 
Location: Noida
Salary: 13l
Bonus: 1l 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 14l 


Decision: Rejected, as my current company matched the offered pay, got ~50% hike. 

Thanks.

title: Cisco | Spring Intern + SDE G4  (Code with Cisco) | Bangalore | PPO
content:
**Education**: B. Tech. in CSE (Tier 1)
Years of Experience: Summer intern (Cisco)
Date of the Offer:  August 2024
Title: Technical Intern I
Stipend: ₹98k per month (88k + 10k - Relocation)
Company: Cisco


**FTE Details:**

Title/Level: SDE G4
Location: Bangalore
Salary: ₹14.5L
PF: ₹87k
Gratuity: ₹34.8k
Performance Bonus (target): ₹72.5k
Joining Bonus: ₹6.5L (Paid in two instalments - in 13th and 25th month)
Relocation Bonus: ₹1.2L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹19.82L (first year)
Other details: Flexible work hours, Broadband, study reimbursements, health insurance, 15 days hotel accomodation
